headline: Illinois American Water Continues Critical Infrastructure Improvements in Village of Hardin’s Water & Wastewater Systems
summary: HARDIN, Ill., September 15, 2025--Illinois American Water continues to make improvements in the Village of Hardin’s water and wastewater systems, investing $2 million since June 2022.

raw.headline: Illinois American Water Continues Critical Infrastructure Improvements in Village of Hardin’s Water & Wastewater Systems

headline: EPA asks court to vacate part of PFAS drinking water lawsuit
summary: The agency told a judge it failed to follow the Safe Drinking Water Act when limiting four PFAS under the regulations. It plans to continue to defend its decision to regulate PFOA and PFOS.

raw.headline: EPA asks court to vacate part of PFAS drinking water lawsuit
